summary: Implement a Plugin system for the Ruby SDK to allow users to self-serve create integrations with Temporal Workflows, following the pattern already established in the Python SDK.
userImpact: Users can create custom integrations with Temporal Workflows without modifying SDK internals.
proposedFix: Copy the existing plugin implementation from the Python SDK to Ruby
resolutionDetails: Plugin system implemented following Python SDK pattern
keyQuote: Implement Plugins so that users can self-serve creating integrations with Temporal Workflows. This is done in Python and we can copy.
